title: [Ta'Illistim, Mzaarine Bazaar]
description: Numerous trees line the cobblestone road, casting shadows upon the stones that otherwise gleam with silvery moonlight.  Variegated blue and green tiles adorn the roofs of cottages and shops, complimenting the silk banners that ripple from poles along the intersection.

Numerous trees line the cobblestone road, casting cool shadows upon the stones that offer a momentary respite from the heat of sun.  Variegated blue and green tiles adorn the roofs of cottages and shops, complimenting the silk banners that ripple from poles along the intersection.
